channel.title: Black Mesa: The Comics Index.
channel.description:
[b]Black Mesa Comics[/b]
- [i][url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=1076']Welcome to Black Mesa[/url][/i], [b]by Collision[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=1081'][i]A Health Warning[/i][/url], by [b]Collision[/b] - [i][url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=1097']A Shameless Plug[/url][/i], by [b]geekofalltrade[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=1170'][i]Another Day, Another Troll (Failcrash Pt.1)[/i][/url], by [b]geekofalltrades[/b] -[i] [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=1308']The Troll Rising! (FailCrash Pt. 2)[/url][/i], by [b]geekofalltrades[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=49605&postcount=185'][i]That Scene[/i][/url], by [b]Keresh[/b] - [i][url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=50353&postcount=221']The Birth of Tamerain[/url][/i], by [b]Keresh[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=55454#post55454'][i]Raw_admin[/i][/url], by [b]Soup[/b] - [i][url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=56753#post56753']A Good Comic[/url][/i], by [b](rot)(fodder)[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=57947#post57947'][i]I Quit the Forums[/i][/url], by [b]Soup[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=58056#post58056'][i]What Makes A Man[/i][/url], by [b]Psyborg[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=112562&postcount=1'][i]Patience[/i][/url], by [b]Darkbabe[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=2861'][i]Brace for Fail: A father in need[/i][/url], by [b]Trigger_Proximity[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12303&showpost.php?p=482400']Release[/url], by [b](rot)(fodder[/b]
[b]Leak-Free Comics[/b]
- [i][url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=56388#post56388']Attack of the Noobs: Part One[/url][/i], by [b]MassaCre[/b] - [i][url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=56391#post56391']Attack of the Noobs: Part Two[/url][/i], by [b]MassaCre[/b] - [i][url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=56395#post56395']Attack of the Noobs: Part Three[/url][/i], by [b]MassaCre[/b] - [i][url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=56399#post56399']Attack of the Noobs: Part Four[/url][/i], by [b]MassaCre[/b] - [i][url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=1539']The Post Wars: Part One[/url][/i], by [b]Operative LM[/b] - [i][url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=56702#post56702']The Post Wars: Part Two[/url][/i], by [b]Operative LM[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=57197#post57197'][i]What Is And What Should Never Be[/i][/url], by [b]Hoboman725[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=58007#post58007'][i]The Beginning[/i][/url], by [b]Hot564231[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=58471#post58471'][i]Cookiez[/i][/url], by [b]Operative LM[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=1628'][i]MassaCre's Life at Leak-Free[/i][/url], by [b]MassaCre[/b] - [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=62932#post62932'][i]Black Sunday[/i][/url], by [b]Loke[/b] [quote="Collision"] [align=center][b][COLOR='Yellow']DOWNLOAD AVAILABLE [COLOR='Lime']THE BLACK-MESA MODEL PACK[/align] [COLOR='Red'][url='https://www.mediafire.com/?niimj0nnmme']DOWNLOAD HERE[/url][/SIZE][/b] [COLOR='DarkOrange'] [b]Extract to "steamapps\yourusername\garrysmod\garrysmod"[/b] PLEASE REPORT ANY ERROR'S AND I'LL FIX THEM ASAP (OR WHEN I CAN BE BOTHERED) [/quote]

item.title: Black Mesa: The Comics Index.
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
I think I have a couple of shameful stuff floating around. But overall the community can be rather forgiving. It is only since the last update that folks got testy, but I think it is all evening out in the end.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa: The Comics Index.
item.dc:creator: ijgs
item.description:
I edited all my “flame” posts heavily before posting, that’s for sure!

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa: The Comics Index.
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Guf:

I was going to suggest one about how brokenfridgehinge had to wield his banhammer against all the whining noobs that were complaining about the delay, but there weren’t that many… evidently most of the community round here are more sane than I’d first thought

I think there was a lot of tolerance going on as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa: The Comics Index.
item.dc:creator: ijgs
item.description:
I remember Sarge, eh was a cool guy and dident afraed of nething. Wrote a mean comic too as I recall. sigh. ho hum!

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa: The Comics Index.
item.dc:creator: Collision
item.description:
zim:

omg coll and any other LFer, what was that CSS comic that that guy made on LF2? That shit was actually funny, did anyone save it?

Oh god, CS Battlegrounds, that shit was epic.

Pity Sarge isnt around anymore and I never did save them.

Read full topic

Since when were you on LeakFree?

item.title: Black Mesa: The Comics Index.
item.dc:creator: Soup
item.description:
1. Get Garry’s Mod
  2. Find the model for each forum member
  3. Use Garry’s Mod and take screenshots with the camera
  4. Make the comic using photoshop, paint, whatever
  5. ???
  6. PROFI-- no, wait: COMIC

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa: The Comics Index.
item.dc:creator: HumanParadoxx
item.description:
Ah, did they stop making comics?
look, I don’t know how long it takes to make a comic (much time I think). So, can I place a suggestion here?
Why don’t you guys create some sort of tutorial for making comics while there aren’t new ones coming out?

Read full topic

item.description:
